using namespace std;

typedef long long Lint;
typedef long double db;
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef pair<Lint,Lint> ll;
typedef pair<ii,Lint> iii;

const int maxn = 200020;
const int maxx = 200000;
const int MOd = 1e9+7;
int K = 100;

int a;
iii ar[maxn];
int bs[maxn*2], lcp[maxn];
char s[maxn];

int main() {
	
	scanf(" %s",s+1);
	a = strlen( s + 1 );
	
	for(int i=1;i<=a;i++) {
		ar[i].fi.fi = s[i] - 'a' + 1;
		ar[i].fi.se = 0;
		ar[i].se = i;
	}
	
	for(int k=0;1;k++) {
		sort( ar+1, ar+1+a );
		
		for(int i=1;i<=a;) {
			int j = i;
			while( j <= a && ar[j].fi.fi == ar[i].fi.fi && ar[i].fi.se == ar[i].fi.se ) {
				bs[ar[i].se] = i;
				j++;
			}
			i = j;
		}
		
		if( (1<<k) > a ) break;
		
		for(int i=1;i<=a;i++) {
			ar[i].fi.fi = bs[i];
			ar[i].fi.se = bs[i+(1<<k)];
			ar[i].se = i;
		}
	}
	
	for(int i=a,p=0;i>=1;i--) {
		if( s[i] == s[ar[bs[i]+1].se] ) p++;
		else p = 0;
		lcp[bs[i]] = p;
	}
	
	// LCP 2.yol :
	
	for(int i=1,p=0;i<=a;i++) {
		p--;
		if( p < 0 ) p = 0;
		if( bs[i] == a ) continue;
		for(int j=ar[bs[i]+1].se; i+p <= a && j+p <= a && s[i+p] == s[j+p] ;p++);
		lcp[bs[i]] = p;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
